title: RIP EYAK
content:
Another language, [Eyak](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203212858/http:/en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Eyak_language) dies, along with its last user [Marie Smith Jones](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203212858/http:/news.bbc.co.uk/2/hi/americas/7206411.stm).

 [‹ Poliphilus/Blado](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203212858/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41543 "Go to previous forum topic") [You've been cited by the Design Police! ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203212858/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41060 "Go to next forum topic")
author: fredo
